name: circos
description: Circos is a software package for visualizing data and information.

dependencies.name: perl
dependencies.description:
Perl 5 is a highly capable, feature-rich programming language with over
27 years of development.

dependencies.name: perl-exporter-tiny
dependencies.description:
An exporter with the features of Sub::Exporter but only core
dependencies

dependencies.name: perl-font-ttf
dependencies.description: Perl module for TrueType Font hacking

dependencies.name: perl-io-string
dependencies.description: Emulate file interface for in-core strings

dependencies.name: perl-list-moreutils
dependencies.description: Provide the stuff missing in List::Util

dependencies.name: perl-math-round
dependencies.description: Math::Round - Perl extension for rounding numbers

dependencies.name: perl-math-vecstat
dependencies.description: Math::VecStat - Some basic numeric stats on vectors

dependencies.name: perl-readonly
dependencies.description: Readonly - Facility for creating read-only scalars, arrays, hashes

dependencies.name: perl-regexp-common
dependencies.description: Regexp::Common - Provide commonly requested regular expressions

dependencies.name: perl-statistics-basic
dependencies.description: Statistics::Basic - A collection of very basic statistics modules

dependencies.name: perl-svg
dependencies.description: Perl extension for generating Scalable Vector Graphics (SVG) documents.

dependencies.name: perl-text-format
dependencies.description: Text::Format - Various subroutines to format text
